title: Ride Concepts teams up with Andreu Lacondeguy for new Vice Mid shoe
content:
A little over a year ago, Ride Concepts launched their new Vice (with a little help from Kyle Strait). With classic skate shoe styling and hidden technical features, the Vice was a great addition to the Ride Concepts lineup. Now, they’ve partnered with another freeride legend on a new shoe with a bit more protection […]

The post Ride Concepts teams up with Andreu Lacondeguy for new Vice Mid shoe appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
